#include <iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;

#define zero "-----"
#define one ".----"
#define two "..---"
#define three "...--"
#define four "....-"
#define five "....."
#define six "-...."
#define seven "--..."
#define eight "---.."
#define nine "----."



int main()
{
    int t,k,count=0;char a[11];
    cin>>t;
    while(t>=1)

     {

    cin>>a;

    for(k=0;a[k]!='\0';k++)
    {
        if(a[k]=='0')
           {

           cout<<zero;
           }
                    if(a[k]=='1')
                    {

                    count++;
            cout<<one;
                    }
                    if(a[k]=='2')
                    {
                        count+=2;
                        cout<<two;
                    }
               if(a[k]=='3')
                    {
                        count+=3;
                        cout<<three;
                    }
                    if(a[k]=='4')
                    {
                        count+=4;
                        cout<<four;
                    }

                    if(a[k]=='5')
                    {
                        count+=5;
                        cout<<five;
                    }
                    if(a[k]=='6')
                    {
                        count+=4;
                        cout<<six;
                    }

                    if(a[k]=='7')
                    {
                        count+=3;
                        cout<<seven;
                    }
                    if(a[k]=='8')
                    {
                        count+=2;
                        cout<<eight;
                    }
                    if(a[k]=='9')
                    {
                        count+=1;
                        cout<<nine;
                    }


    }
    cout<<"\n"<<count<<"\n";
    count=0;
    t--;

     }


    return 0;
}
